data.name: alteryx
data.description: A data analytics platform that enables easy data blending and analysis for actionable insights.

information.responsibility:
At Alteryx, I was a member of the frontend and TypeScript lead group, shaping company-wide standards. 
 I played a pivotal role in four main projects. Initially, I worked on a platform hub for credentials and connections, which, despite its potential, wasn't launched. Subsequently, I contributed to a project similar to what is now Alteryx's Platform 1.0, focusing on both frontend and backend scheduling. 
 With the shift to Platform 2.0, we embraced a micro-frontend architecture, enhancing feature documentation with detailed diagrams and documents, where I focused on scheduling.  
 My time at Alteryx was rewarding, leading a talented team of engineers. Embracing the need for new challenges, I made the decision to advance my career journey.
